attributes.action: Try getting an nhs dentist. you are not listening they have all gone private
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I HAVE BEEN TRYING TO GET AN NHS DENTIST IN SUTTON.  MINE HAS TAKEN EARLY RETIREMENT, DISGUSTED BY THE CHANGES LAST APRIL.  ALMOST ALL HAVE GONE PRIVATE.  I KNOW BECAUSE I HAVE SPENT HOURS PHONING THEM ALL. MR BLAIR YOU ARE NOT LISTENING.  I EXPECT YOU HAVE A PRIVATE DENTIST, THE LOCAL PATIENT LIASION SERVICE IN SUTTON AGREE IT'S AN APPALLING SITUATION THAT THEY CAN DO NOTHING ABOUT!!!! THANKS FOR LEAVING US WITHOUT ANY DENTISTS

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
